text:
@ndrew_lawrence @chrislhayes For the love of god.
First and foremost: never drink and please please please never inject yourself with disinfectant!
Second of all: cancer, obesity, heart disease are not infectious diseases, covid-19 is.
Why these folks can’t keep their stupidity to themselves???
